fields.name: TMR_Cast
fields.description: Trace metal rosette deployment number from the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE)

fields.name: ACE_Event
fields.description: Unique event number from ACE

fields.name: Time [UTC]
fields.description: Time of Trace metal rosette sampling (h)h:mm [UTC]

fields.name: Date_Time [ISO_8601]
fields.description: Date and time of sample collection in ISO_8601 format [yyyy-mm-ddThh:mi:ss+00:00]

fields.name: ACE_Sample_ID
fields.description: Unique sample identifier from ACE, formatted as standardized for the ACE cruise expedition as follows: shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsampleID

fields.name: Latitude [degrees_north]
fields.description: latitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began [decimal degrees North]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Latitude at which trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: Longitude [degrees_east]
fields.description: longitude at which the trace metal rosette deployment began [decimal degrees East]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Longitude at which trace metal rosette deployment began

fields.name: Depth [m]
fields.description: depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was collected [m]

fields.name: Fe [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved iron [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Fe_stdev [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved iron concentration [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Fe_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.

fields.name: Zn [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved zinc [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Zn_stdev [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved zinc concentration [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Zn_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.

fields.name: Cu [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved copper [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Cu_stdev [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved copper concentration [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Ni_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.

fields.name: Ni [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved nickel [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Ni_stdev [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved nickel concentration [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Ni_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.

fields.name: Cd [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved cadmium [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Cd_stdev [nmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved cadmium concentration [nanomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Cd_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.

fields.name: Pb [pmol kg-1]
fields.description: Concentration of dissolved lead [picomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Pb_stdev [pmol kg-1]
fields.description: Standard deviation of dissolved lead concentration [picomols per kilogram]

fields.name: Pb_flags
fields.description: Quality flags for Fe data. A value of 1 indicates no quality issues and a values of 9 indicates values deemed oceanographically inconsistent and suspect of contamination. See README file for further information.
